		<meta charset="UTF-8">

		<meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="ie=edge">

		<!-- <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://panoramapro.ru/wp-content/themes/panoramapro/assets/css/loader.css"> -->
				<style>
			html, body{
				height: 100%;
			}
			body{
				overflow-x: hidden;
			    margin: 0;
			    font-size: 1rem;
			    line-height: 1.5;
			    background-color: #fff;
			}

			a {
				outline: none; 
				color: var(--blackTxt);
			}
			.container {
				width: 100%;
				padding-right: 15px;
				padding-left: 15px;
				margin-right: auto;
				margin-left: auto;
			    max-width: 1440px;
			}
			.container-fluid {
			    width: 100%;
			    padding-right: 15px;
			    padding-left: 15px;
			    margin-right: auto;
			    margin-left: auto;
			}
			.row {
			    display: flex;
			    flex-wrap: wrap;
			    margin-right: -15px;
			    margin-left: -15px;
			}
			#info_bar {
				min-height: 26px;
			}
			#info_bar .ib_info {
			    display: flex;
			    flex-wrap: wrap;
			    justify-content: flex-end;
			    width: 100%;
			}
			#header {
				min-height: 62px;
				background:#464646;
				padding-top:15px;
				padding-bottom:15px;
				width: 100%;
			}
			#header {
				/*opacity: 1;*/
				/*max-height: 80px;*/
			}

			#header > .container {
				opacity: 0;
			}
			#header .header-row  {
				-ms-flex-align: start;
				align-items: flex-start;
			}
			#header .header-row > * {
				display: flex;
				-webkit-box-align: center;
				        align-items: center;
				justify-content: end;
				min-height: 2rem;
			}
			#header .head_logo {
				padding: 0 5px;
				justify-content: start;
			}
			#header .head_logo img {
				/*min-width: 220px;*/
			}
			#header .navigation-top .navbar {
				padding: 0;
			}
			#header .navbar-dark .navbar-toggler {
			    color: var(--colorViolet);
				padding: .25rem .55rem;
			}
			#header .head_menu {
				list-style:none;
				padding:0;
				margin:0;
				display:-webkit-box;
				display:flex;
				-webkit-box-pack: justify;
				        justify-content: space-between;
				-webkit-box-align: center;
				        align-items: center;
			}
			#header .head_menu.mobile {
				justify-content: flex-end;
				order: 13;
			}
			#header .head_menu_mobile {
				list-style: none;
				padding: 0;
				margin: 0;
				display: -webkit-box;
				display: flex;
				-webkit-box-pack: justify;
				-webkit-box-align: center;
				align-items: center;
				justify-content: flex-start;
/*				max-width: 100%;*/
				min-height: 2rem;
			}
			
			#top-promo, #bottom-promo {
			    max-height: 108px;
			    overflow: hidden;
			    display: none;
			}
			#top-promo {
				margin-top: 20px;
			}
			#top-promo .carousel-nav {
				display: none;
			}
			.dropdown-menu {
				display: none;
			}
			#mainContent, #content {
				opacity: 0;
				transition: opacity 0.3s linear;
			}
			.preloader {
				position: fixed;
				left: 0;
				top: 0;
				right: 0;
				bottom: 0;
				background: #fff;
				z-index: 1001;
				width: 100%;
				max-width: 100vw;
				height: 100%;
				overflow: hidden;

			}

			.sk-cube-grid {
				width: 4em;
				height: 4em;
				position: relative;
				left: 50%;
				top: 50vh;
				margin: -4em 0 0 -2em;

			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube {
			  width: 33%;
			  height: 33%;
			  background-color: #4f0181;
			  float: left;
			  -webkit-animation: sk-cube-grid-scale-delay 1.3s infinite ease-in-out;
			          animation: sk-cube-grid-scale-delay 1.3s infinite ease-in-out;
			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube-1 {
			  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.2s;
			          animation-delay: 0.2s;
			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube-2 {
			  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.3s;
			          animation-delay: 0.3s;
			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube-3 {
			  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.4s;
			          animation-delay: 0.4s;
			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube-4 {
			  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.1s;
			          animation-delay: 0.1s;
			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube-5 {
			  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.2s;
			          animation-delay: 0.2s;
			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube-6 {
			  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.3s;
			          animation-delay: 0.3s;
			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube-7 {
			  -webkit-animation-delay: 0s;
			          animation-delay: 0s;
			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube-8 {
			  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.1s;
			          animation-delay: 0.1s;
			}
			.sk-cube-grid .sk-cube-9 {
			  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.2s;
			          animation-delay: 0.2s;
			}

			@-webkit-keyframes sk-cube-grid-scale-delay {
			  0%, 70%, 100% {
			    -webkit-transform: scale3D(1, 1, 1);
			            transform: scale3D(1, 1, 1);
			  }
			  35% {
			    -webkit-transform: scale3D(0, 0, 1);
			            transform: scale3D(0, 0, 1);
			  }
			}

			@keyframes sk-cube-grid-scale-delay {
			  0%, 70%, 100% {
			    -webkit-transform: scale3D(1, 1, 1);
			            transform: scale3D(1, 1, 1);
			  }
			  35% {
			    -webkit-transform: scale3D(0, 0, 1);
			            transform: scale3D(0, 0, 1);
			  }
			}

			.preloader.visible {
			  visibility: visible;
			  opacity: 1;
			  transition: opacity 0.5s linear;
			}

			.preloader.hidden {
			  visibility: hidden;
			  opacity: 0;
			  transition: visibility 0s 0.5s, opacity 0.5s linear;
			}
		@media screen and (min-width: 992px) {
			.desktop #header .header-row  {
				display: none;
				-ms-flex-align: center;
				align-items: center; 
			}
			.desktop #header {
			    max-height: 84px;
			    overflow: hidden;
			}
			.feedback-btn {
				opacity: 0;
			}
		}

		</style>
